definition: The plugin tutorials node features the definitions of tutorials to be included as plugins in the current workspace.

paragraphs.text: How the Plugin Tutorials node works
Tutorials included in the workspace as plugins do not keep track of users' progress, thus, may not return to the last step using the Resume button on the menu.
To add the plugin tutorials node, select Add Missing Items on the parent node menu.
Select Configure on the menu to access the configuration.
